holidays.name: National Sunglasses Day
holidays.description: A day dedicated to celebrating the cool and practical accessory that helps us avoid squinting at the sun and look stylish.
holidays.origin: Originating in the United States, this unofficial holiday promotes eye safety and fashionable eyewear during summer months.
holidays.funFact: Sunglasses were originally invented in China over 2,000 years ago, primarily to protect eyes from glare rather than for style!
